an10.99:1.1: Atha kho ayasma upali yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma upali bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.99:2.1: “Durabhisambhavani hi kho, upali, arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani.
an10.99:2.3: Ekatte haranti manne mano vanani samadhim alabhamanassa bhikkhuno.
an10.99:2.5: ‘aham samadhim alabhamano arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevissami’ti, tassetam patikankham:
an10.99:3.2: Atha agaccheyya hatthinago sattaratano va addhattharatano va.
an10.99:3.4: ‘yannunaham imam udakarahadam ogahetva kannasandhovikampi khiddam kileyyam pitthisandhovikampi khiddam kileyyam.
an10.99:3.5: Kannasandhovikampi khiddam kilitva pitthisandhovikampi khiddam kilitva nhatva ca pivitva ca paccuttaritva yena kamam pakkameyyan’ti.
an10.99:3.6: So tam udakarahadam ogahetva kannasandhovikampi khiddam kileyya pitthisandhovikampi khiddam kileyya;
an10.99:3.7: kannasandhovikampi khiddam kilitva pitthisandhovikampi khiddam kilitva nhatva ca pivitva ca paccuttaritva yena kamam pakkameyya.
an10.99:3.9: Maha, upali, attabhavo gambhire gadham vindati.
an10.99:4.1: Atha agaccheyya saso va bilaro va.
an10.99:4.4: Yannunaham imam udakarahadam ogahetva kannasandhovikampi khiddam kileyyam pitthisandhovikampi khiddam kileyyam;
an10.99:4.5: kannasandhovikampi khiddam kilitva pitthisandhovikampi khiddam kilitva nhatva ca pivitva ca paccuttaritva yena kamam pakkameyyan’ti.
an10.99:4.6: So tam udakarahadam sahasa appatisankha pakkhandeyya.
an10.99:4.10: Paritto, upali, attabhavo gambhire gadham na vindati.
an10.99:4.11: Evamevam kho, upali, yo evam vadeyya:
an10.99:4.12: ‘aham samadhim alabhamano arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevissami’ti, tassetam patikankham:
an10.99:5.1: Seyyathapi, upali, daharo kumaro mando uttanaseyyako sakena muttakarisena kilati.
an10.99:6.1: “Sa kho so, upali, kumaro aparena samayena vuddhimanvaya indriyanam paripakamanvaya
an10.99:6.2: yani kanici kumarakanam kilapanakani bhavanti, seyyathidam—vankakam ghatikam mokkhacikam cingulakam pattalhakam rathakam dhanukam, tehi kilati.
an10.99:6.4: nanvayam khidda purimaya khiddaya abhikkantatara ca panitatara ca”ti?
an10.99:7.1: “Sa kho so, upali, kumaro aparena samayena vuddhimanvaya indriyanam paripakamanvaya
an10.99:7.3: cakkhuvinneyyehi rupehi itthehi kantehi manapehi piyarupehi kamupasamhitehi rajaniyehi,
an10.99:7.7: kayavinneyyehi photthabbehi itthehi kantehi manapehi piyarupehi kamupasamhitehi rajaniyehi.
an10.99:7.9: nanvayam khidda purimahi khiddahi abhikkantatara ca panitatara ca”ti?
an10.99:8.1: “Idha kho pana vo, upali, tathagato loke uppajjati araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava.
an10.99:8.2: So imam lokam sadevakam samarakam sabrahmakam sassamanabrahmanim pajam sadevamanussam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedeti.
an10.99:8.3: So dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
an10.99:9.1: Tam dhammam sunati gahapati va gahapatiputto va annatarasmim va kule paccajato.
an10.99:9.2: So tam dhammam sutva tathagate saddham patilabhati.
an10.99:9.3: So tena saddhapatilabhena samannagato iti patisancikkhati:
an10.99:9.5: Nayidam sukaram agaram ajjhavasata ekantaparipunnam ekantaparisuddham sankhalikhitam brahmacariyam caritum.
an10.99:9.6: Yannunaham kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajeyyan’ti.
an10.99:10.1: So aparena samayena appam va bhogakkhandham pahaya mahantam va bhogakkhandham pahaya appam va natiparivattam pahaya mahantam va natiparivattam pahaya kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajati.
an10.99:11.1: So evam pabbajito samano bhikkhunam sikkhasajivasamapanno panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato hoti nihitadando nihitasattho lajji dayapanno sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharati.
an10.99:12.1: Adinnadanam pahaya adinnadana pativirato hoti dinnadayi dinnapatikankhi; athenena sucibhutena attana viharati.
an10.99:13.1: Abrahmacariyam pahaya brahmacari hoti aracari virato methuna gamadhamma.
an10.99:14.1: Musavadam pahaya musavada pativirato hoti saccavadi saccasandho theto paccayiko avisamvadako lokassa.
an10.99:15.1: Pisunam vacam pahaya pisunaya vacaya pativirato hoti, ito sutva na amutra akkhata imesam bhedaya, amutra va sutva na imesam akkhata amusam bhedaya. Iti bhinnanam va sandhata sahitanam va anuppadata, samaggaramo samaggarato samagganandi; samaggakaranim vacam bhasita hoti.
an10.99:16.1: Pharusam vacam pahaya pharusaya vacaya pativirato hoti. Ya sa vaca nela kannasukha pemaniya hadayangama pori bahujanakanta bahujanamanapa, tatharupim vacam bhasita hoti.
an10.99:17.1: Samphappalapam pahaya samphappalapa pativirato hoti kalavadi bhutavadi atthavadi dhammavadi vinayavadi, nidhanavatim vacam bhasita hoti kalena sapadesam pariyantavatim atthasamhitam.
an10.99:19.1: So santuttho hoti kayapariharikena civarena kucchipariharikena pindapatena.
an10.99:19.3: seyyathapi nama pakkhi sakuno yena yeneva deti sapattabharova deti.
an10.99:19.4: Evamevam bhikkhu santuttho hoti kayapariharikena civarena kucchipariharikena pindapatena. Yena yeneva pakkamati samadayeva pakkamati.
an10.99:19.5: So imina ariyena silakkhandhena samannagato ajjhattam anavajjasukham patisamvedeti.
an10.99:20.1: So cakkhuna rupam disva na nimittaggahi hoti nanubyanjanaggahi.
an10.99:20.2: Yatvadhikaranamenam cakkhundriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum, tassa samvaraya patipajjati; rakkhati cakkhundriyam, cakkhundriye samvaram apajjati.
an10.99:20.7: manasa dhammam vinnaya na nimittaggahi hoti nanubyanjanaggahi.
an10.99:20.8: Yatvadhikaranamenam manindriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum, tassa samvaraya patipajjati; rakkhati manindriyam, manindriye samvaram apajjati.
an10.99:20.9: So imina ariyena indriyasamvarena samannagato ajjhattam abyasekasukham patisamvedeti.
an10.99:21.1: So abhikkante patikkante sampajanakari hoti, alokite vilokite sampajanakari hoti, saminjite pasarite sampajanakari hoti, sanghatipattacivaradharane sampajanakari hoti, asite pite khayite sayite sampajanakari hoti, uccarapassavakamme sampajanakari hoti, gate thite nisinne sutte jagarite bhasite tunhibhave sampajanakari hoti.
an10.99:22.1: So imina ca ariyena silakkhandhena samannagato, imina ca ariyena indriyasamvarena samannagato, imina ca ariyena satisampajannena samannagato
an10.99:22.2: vivittam senasanam bhajati arannam rukkhamulam pabbatam kandaram giriguham susanam vanapattham abbhokasam palalapunjam.
an10.99:22.3: So arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va nisidati pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
an10.99:23.1: So abhijjham loke pahaya vigatabhijjhena cetasa viharati, abhijjhaya cittam parisodheti.
an10.99:23.2: Byapadapadosam pahaya abyapannacitto viharati sabbapanabhutahitanukampi, byapadapadosa cittam parisodheti.
an10.99:23.3: Thinamiddham pahaya vigatathinamiddho viharati alokasanni sato sampajano, thinamiddha cittam parisodheti.
an10.99:23.4: Uddhaccakukkuccam pahaya anuddhato viharati ajjhattam vupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkucca cittam parisodheti.
an10.99:23.5: Vicikiccham pahaya tinnavicikiccho viharati akathankathi kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaya cittam parisodheti.
an10.99:24.1: So ime panca nivarane pahaya cetaso upakkilese pannaya dubbalikarane,
an10.99:24.2: vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an10.99:24.4: ‘nanvayam viharo purimehi viharehi abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca’”ti?
an10.99:25.1: “Imampi kho, upali, mama savaka attani dhammam sampassamana arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevanti, no ca kho tava anuppattasadattha viharanti.
an10.99:26.1: Puna caparam, upali, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an10.99:26.3: ‘nanvayam viharo purimehi viharehi abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca’”ti?
an10.99:27.1: “Imampi kho, upali, mama savaka attani dhammam sampassamana arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevanti, no ca kho tava anuppattasadattha viharanti.
an10.99:28.1: Puna caparam, upali, bhikkhu pitiya ca viraga …pe… tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an10.99:28.3: ‘nanvayam viharo purimehi viharehi abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca’”ti?
an10.99:29.1: “Imampi kho, upali, mama savaka attani dhammam sampassamana arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevanti, no ca kho tava anuppattasadattha viharanti.
an10.99:30.1: Puna caparam, upali, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam …pe….
an10.99:31.1: Puna caparam, upali, bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an10.99:31.3: ‘nanvayam viharo purimehi viharehi abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca’”ti?
an10.99:32.1: “Imampi kho, upali, mama savaka attani dhammam sampassamana arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevanti, no ca kho tava anuppattasadattha viharanti.
an10.99:33.1: Puna caparam, upali, bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati …pe….
an10.99:34.1: Sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati …pe….
an10.99:35.1: Sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma ‘santametam panitametan’ti nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an10.99:35.3: ‘nanvayam viharo purimehi viharehi abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca’”ti?
an10.99:36.1: “Imampi kho, upali, mama savaka attani dhammam sampassamana arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevanti, no ca kho tava anuppattasadattha viharanti.
an10.99:37.1: Puna caparam, upali, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati; pannaya cassa disva asava parikkhina honti.
an10.99:37.3: ‘nanvayam viharo purimehi viharehi abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca’”ti?
an10.99:38.1: “Imampi kho, upali, mama savaka attani dhammam sampassamana arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevanti, anuppattasadattha ca viharanti.
